skilllist.skilldesc: Kadita gains the <font color="a6aafb">Blessing of the Ocean</font> every 30s. The Blessing is triggered when she takes damage from enemy heroes and lasts 4s, allowing her to recover 65% of the HP lost within the duration afterward.

Kadita summons an ocean wave to carry herself in the target direction and back, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. While inside the wave, she gains Control Immunity and 50% Damage Reduction. This skill can pass through obstacles and terrain.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Kadita exits the wave without interrupting the wave's movement.

After a short delay, Kadita summons an ocean wave to erupt at the target location, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+140% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 1s.

Kadita can cast this skill during <font color="a6aafb">Ocean Ode</font> to summon an ocean wave beneath her with a shorter eruption delay.

Kadita dives into the ground and sends ocean waves in all directions, each dealing 270<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. Enemies hit by multiple waves take increased damage. After a short period, the waves return to Kadita, each dealing 180<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit.

When underground, Kadita becomes untargetable and gains 60% Movement Speed.

__data.skilldesc: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num2> [C1Magic Damage] to nearby enemies, [C2petrify] them for <Num1>s, and slow them by <%Num3> for <Num4>s afterward.
__data.skilldescemblem: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: High burst damage to eliminate back line enemies.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equiptips:
+45 Adaptive Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: Vatangame Esports Zeichnen
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Kadita works well with heroes who possess strong CC abilities, such as Atlas and Tigreal, as their CC will make it easier for Kadita to hit more enemies with her Ultimate.

strong.desc: Kadita excels at countering heroes that lack mobility, such as Aurora and Eudora, because it's difficult for them to escape Kadita's 2nd Skill, and knocking them airborne sets them up for her Ultimate.

weak.desc: Kadita is countered by heroes with long range and high mobility, such as Clint and Beatrix, since it's difficult for Kadita to close in on them or hit them with her 2nd Skill.
